name: Proportunity
slogan: The first lender built by first time buyers for first time buyers

team.title: CTO
team.name: Stefan Adrian Boronea
team.bioHtml: Co-founder & CTO @Proportunity - first lender built by first time buyers for first time buyers Worked at @IBM, @Booking.com

team.title: Senior Growth Manager
team.name: Andrei Ioan Stan
team.bioHtml: Senior Growth Manager @Proportunity

team.title: Customer Success Lead
team.name: Becky Jay
team.bioHtml: Previously managed multiple client accounts for a specialist B2B travel agency, moving into startup world via Chalk Up Travel and Pesky Fish

jobs.title: Full Stack/Backend Engineer
jobs.description:
Our mission at Proportunity is simple: use technology to help turn generation rent into generation own. We’re well funded by some of the world's best investors and are backed the leading real estate advisory in the UK. If you have big dreams, so do we!

If you’re an ambitious MEAN stack developer, you're focused, have a pragmatic mindset and are looking for a challenge, come join us! We're looking for someone brilliant to join our team, and develop our customer platform.

Our extremely technical team turns data into quantifiable insights that help real estate investors and buyers make safer, more informed decisions. We analyse large amounts of data from various sources in multiple formats to understand how the real estate market evolves over time, and take a peek into future growth.

The mindset we share at Proportunity is that we don’t expect anyone to know all the answers, but we should have a plan how to get closer to them. We like to learn, adapt and share knowledge with the team.


Benefits
Full-time with flexible hours
 5 weeks vacation 
Competitive salary 
Employee stock options 
Computer/workstation provided
 Fast-growing startup culture
 Fun team mates
 Encouragement of personal projects and creativity


Must-have
node.js (w/ Express) experience
You've worked with a database storage system (ideally MongoDB or postgresql)
You have experience handling large datasets
 You're familiar with git
You know your way very well around a Linux terminal
You’re passionate about technology and programming
You're a team player and are dedicated to helping others
You are proactive and have a can-do mindset
 You have good communication skills


Nice-to-have
You have at least 3 years hands-on experience building large-scale software projects
 You're familiar with or have been using AWS and/or Google Cloud Platform
You're a great fan of automation
You’re an open source contributor
Passionate about real estate
